InformativeText.Abstract: The Chromaticity Tolerance characteristic is a tolerance of a tuple of chromaticity values represented as a value of a radius of a circle in the CIE 1976 (u',v') diagram; value corresponding to the 3-sigma values of the expected chromaticity deviations.

Field.name: Chromaticity Tolerance
Field.InformativeText: Unit is unitless with a resolution of 0.0001
